metadata.synopsis: One-liner with an adventurer in Flophouse.She always wanted to become an adventurer, trained a lot for it and is eager for action.Her sister wrote her a letter - WYR_Flophouse_LetterToAdventurer which can be found on the second floor.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug Book - Go To Region - Act 3 Wyrm's Crossing - FlophouseTalk to the adventurer on the ground floor.

0.speaker: Adventurer Rosanna
0.text: 'Come to Baldur's Gate', he said. 'Adventurers get welcomed as heroes', he said. Poxy Drim and his bleedin' notions.

1.speaker: Adventurer Rosanna
1.text: This adventurer lark is rubbish. Should've listened to me da. Become a tanner. Bet they're gasping for tanners in Baldur's Gate.
